mapper.select: SELECT * FROM question_post ORDER BY question_id DESC
SELECT * FROM question_post where status = #{status} ORDER BY question_id DESC

SELECT question_post.question_id, question_post.question_content, question_post.question_title, question_post.question_date, question_post.email FROM question_post INNER JOIN question_scrape ON question_post.question_id = question_scrape.question_id WHERE question_scrape.email = #{email} ORDER BY question_post.question_date DESC
select * from question_post where email = #{email} ORDER BY question_id DESC
mapper.insert: insert into question_post(question_id, question_content, question_title, question_date, email, status, tag1, tag2) value (null, #{question_content}, #{question_title}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{email}, 0, #{tag1}, #{tag2})
insert into question_answer(answer_id, answer_content, answer_date, question_id, answerer_id, answer_status) values (null, #{answer_content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{question_id}, #{answerer_id}, 0)
